title: PhysicsLab Policy Overrides
description: Best-effort validation for optional policy overrides saved in data/roaming/policy.json.

max_concurrent_sims.description: Maximum number of simulations allowed to run simultaneously.

low_end_mode.description: Hint to prefer low-end device settings.

runs_keep_last_n.description: Retention window for lab run directories.

exports_enabled.description: Allows future export features when true.

reduced_motion_enforced.description: Forces reduced-motion mode even if the user preference is disabled.
